description: JSON-Schema of the response obtained with the GET /_botapi/recents.json?date_from=YYYY-mm-dd&page=p.

total_pages.description: The requested result is fragmented into pages.

bot_url.description: Bot-API URL corresponding to the document corresponding to this list item.

id_local.description: CELEX number of this document, i.e. id_local from the ELI ontology.

date_document.description: Date-string in format "YYYY-mm-dd", indicating the date of publication for initial versions, or the Version-date of the document.

in_force.description: in-force status of the legislative act. Only provided with the single_step-Option.

title.description: Full document title. Only provided with the single_step-Option.

name.description: Typically used reference for this document. E.g. Regulation (EU) 575/2013. Only provided with the single_step-Option.

url.description: URL to the document's landing page. E.g. "https://lexparency.de/eu/CRR/". Only provided with the single_step-Option.

body.description: List of Articles, constituting this document. Only provided with the single_step-Option.

name.description: Qualified identifier for referencing purposes. E.g. "Art. 1 CRR â€“ Regulation (EU) No 575/2013"

body.description: Text of the article's body, including basic markup. No anchor tags.

transaction_type.description: Describing effect of the recent update on the single article. I.e. the corresponding database-transaction.
